game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact and return it to the village elder.
game.description: The ancient artifact of the village was stolen by a group of bandits. It is your task to recover it and bring it back to the village elder. Be careful, the bandits are hiding in the mountain caverns.
game.reward: 2000 gold pieces and Potion of Eternity

task.objective: Find the location of the caverns
task.description: Ask around the village and collect clues to find the location of the mountain caverns.

task.objective: Defeat the bandits and recover the artifact
task.description: Face the bandits and defeat them to recover the artifact.

task.objective: Return the artifact to the elder
task.description: Return to the village and give the artifact back to the village elder.
